page.t: Notice: May only be opened by Banking Clan employees.\nDanger: Unauthorized access could result in death.\nReward offered: If found, please return to a Banking Clan employee. Purrhaps you can bypass its security lock with the right tool.
These lootboxes are fused shut. They can only be forced open.
The InterGalactic Banking Clan uses military ships to transport credits between their vaults.
The large vault on the top of a Banking Clan's Vault
The smaller vaults near the docking piers of a Banking Clan's Vault
Critical Security Bypass failure, the box has fused itself shut.
As you open the lootbox, you detect a broadcast containing your identity.
